mapper.sql: relative_per_id, report_id, iscoordinate, report_type, report_propert, data1, data2, data3, data4, data5, data6, data7, data8, data9,data10, card_just, card_back, obligat_right, obligat_right_no, obligat_time, capital, interest, interest_rate, debt, debt_no, debt_time, debt_certificate, upload_debt_certificate, is_result, economics, `USAGE`, prject_manager, create_user_id, update_user_id,create_time,update_time
mapper.select: SELECT br.`report_id`,br.report_propert,brp.relative_per_id,brp.report_propert AS 'brpReport', br.`data1`,br.`data2`,br.`data3`,br.`data4`,br.`data5`,br.`data6`,br.`data7`,br.`data8`,br.`data9`,br.`data10`, brp.data1 AS 'brpdata1',brp.data2 AS 'brpdata2',brp.data3 AS 'brpdata3',brp.data4 AS 'brpdata4',brp.data5 AS 'brpdata5', brp.data6 AS 'brpdata6',brp.data7 AS 'brpdata7',brp.data8 AS 'brpdata8',brp.data9 AS 'brpdata9',brp.data10 AS 'brpdata10' FROM bus_relative_person brp LEFT JOIN bus_report br ON brp.report_id = br.`report_id` WHERE brp.relative_per_id = #{relativePerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT br.`report_id`,brp.relative_per_id,brp.`create_time`,br.`data1` AS 'debtName',brp.data1 AS 'personName',froma.assignment_agreement_no ,fromb.cost AS 'bb_cost',fromc.cost AS 'zx_cost',fromd.cost AS 'hc_cost', pd.amount_cumulative,pd.debt_yaer,pd.debt_type,pc.company_name FROM bus_report br LEFT JOIN `bus_relative_person` brp ON br.`report_id` = brp.`report_id` LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bp.propert_id,baa.assignment_agreement_no,bp.relative_per_id FROM bus_propert bp LEFT JOIN bus_assignment_agreement baa ON bp.propert_id = baa.propert_id ) froma ON froma.relative_per_id = brp.relative_per_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bus_pay_detail.`relative_per_id`,bus_pay_detail.`cost` FROM bus_pay_detail WHERE bus_pay_detail.`flag`='1' ) fromb ON fromb.relative_per_id = brp.relative_per_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bus_pay_detail.`relative_per_id`,bus_pay_detail.`cost` FROM bus_pay_detail WHERE bus_pay_detail.`flag`='3' ) fromc ON fromc.relative_per_id = brp.relative_per_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bus_pay_detail.`relative_per_id`,bus_pay_detail.`cost` FROM bus_pay_detail WHERE bus_pay_detail.`flag`='4' ) fromd ON fromd.relative_per_id = brp.relative_per_id LEFT JOIN pub_debt pd ON brp.relative_per_id = pd.relative_per_id LEFT JOIN pub_company pc ON pc.company_id = br.company_id

mapper.update:
update bus_relative_person
report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
iscoordinate = #{iscoordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_propert = #{reportPropert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data1 = #{data1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data2 = #{data2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data3 = #{data3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data4 = #{data4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data5 = #{data5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data6 = #{data6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data7 = #{data7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data8 = #{data8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data9 = #{data9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data10 = #{data10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_just = #{cardJust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
card_back = #{cardBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligat_right = #{obligatRight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obligat_right_no = #{obligatRightNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
obligat_time = #{obligatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
capital = #{capital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest = #{interest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
debt = #{debt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
debt_no = #{debtNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
debt_time = #{debtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
debt_certificate = #{debtCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_debt_certificate = #{uploadDebtCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_result = #{isResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
economics = #{economics,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`USAGE` = #{usage,jdbcType=CHAR},
prject_manager = #{prjectManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where relative_per_id = #{relativePerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
